H0.text: Microsporangia are another name for anther pollen sacs.

H1.text: Ganglia is another name for anther pollen sacs.

H2.text: Megasporangia are another name for anther pollen sacs.

H3.text: Gametangia are another name for anther pollen sacs.

A4.text: Heterosporous plants that produced microspores in microsporangia and megaspores in separate megasporangia evolved independently in several plant groups during the Devonian period.

A5.text: In gymnosperms and angiosperm anthers, the microsporangia produce microsporocytes, the microspore mother cells, which then produce four microspores through the process of meiosis.
